mapper.update:
update tc_goods
ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ITEM_CHK_CODE = #{itemChkCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MCHT_ID = #{mchtId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MCHT_NAME = #{mchtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ITEM_TYPE = #{itemType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ITEM_NAME = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITEM_ACT_PRICE = #{itemActPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GOODS_DEAL_FEE = #{goodsDealFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RTNISTD_STATE = #{rtnistdState,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RTNISTD_RSN_TYPE = #{rtnistdRsnType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RTNISTD_REASON = #{rtnistdReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODS_RFD_FEE = #{goodsRfdFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_NICKNAME = #{userNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_PHONENO = #{userPhoneno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITEM_VALID_START = #{itemValidStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ITEM_VALID_END = #{itemValidEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
USE_TIME = #{useTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
USE_RESULT = #{useResult,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SHOP_ID = #{shopId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SHOP_SHORT_NAME = #{shopShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHOP_NAME = #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXP_STATE = #{expState,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EXP_TIME = #{expTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CHECK_STATE = #{checkState,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SETTLEMENT_DATE = #{settlementDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DATA_STATE = #{dataState,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFYER = #{modifyer,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where GOODS_ID = #{goodsId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update tc_goods set ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ITEM_CHK_CODE = #{itemChkCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MCHT_ID = #{mchtId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MCHT_NAME = #{mchtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ITEM_TYPE = #{itemType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ITEM_NAME = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_ACT_PRICE = #{itemActPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GOODS_DEAL_FEE = #{goodsDealFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RTNISTD_STATE = #{rtnistdState,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RTNISTD_RSN_TYPE = #{rtnistdRsnType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RTNISTD_REASON = #{rtnistdReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOODS_RFD_FEE = #{goodsRfdFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_NICKNAME = #{userNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_PHONENO = #{userPhoneno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_VALID_START = #{itemValidStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ITEM_VALID_END = #{itemValidEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, USE_TIME = #{useTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, USE_RESULT = #{useResult,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SHOP_ID = #{shopId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SHOP_SHORT_NAME = #{shopShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOP_NAME = #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXP_STATE = #{expState,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EXP_TIME = #{expTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CHECK_STATE = #{checkState,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SETTLEMENT_DATE = #{settlementDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DATA_STATE = #{dataState,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFYER = #{modifyer,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where GOODS_ID = #{goodsId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
